short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take notes from your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click anywhere in your new tab to create a new note or a new shortcut to any website. Type text, paste images or URL shortcuts, and drag notes around to organise your space.

TapTab runs entirely locally, doesn't require to sign up, and your data never leaves your browser.

TapTab is free, the best way to support it is to leave a review!
